column4: does this mean that feisty can't use older kernels in feisty? W: udev hook script requires at least kernel version 2.6.19
good to know. too bad 2.6.19 is no longer available, as far as i can tell, and the 2.6.20 kernels madwifi doesn't work.
well, it's unfortunate .. but feisty requires the newer kernels .. give it a few months to resolve itself, it's still a pre-release candidate
